name: Word Feud
description:
Back of Box - ColecoVision (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Want some fast fun and lots of belly laughs? Need a team game to liven the party? Play Word Feud, a captivating game of smashing graphics, rainbow hues, and nifty sounds. Brightly colored letters riotously fill the screen. You and your opponent grab the joysticks, put your finger on the button and go! Or use the keyboard. First to find the word hidden in a maze of letters racks up the points. A giggle-a-second when you play furiously against the alphabet-eating hop jumping frog and the fluttering, ravenous butterfly. A marvelous new challenge that needs quick minds and nimble fingers. Kids love it, adults are charmed. Positively entertaining! A game of letters and laughs!
